channel.title: Help with Dialogues
channel.description:
Source - Torvapkz V2
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/278837-pi-adding-npc-resets-stats.html
What i'm trying to do - make an npc that resets stats
Problem - When I talk to him he opens up a gambling dialogue.
Reply to me if you need any code I have put

item.title: Help with Dialogues
item.dc:creator: @FuZzIoN FuZzIoN
item.description:
@FuZzIoN wrote:

[quote=“Encryption, post:2, topic:411579”][quote author=FuZzIoN link=topic=512833.msg3722146#msg3722146 date=1314015640]
Source - Torvapkz V2

http://www.google.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/278837-pi-adding-npc-resets-stats.html

What i’m trying to do - make an npc that resets stats

Problem - When I talk to him he opens up a gambling dialogue.

Reply to me if you need any code I have put
[/quote]

Add the dialogues to another npc, because your npc that your using may be used just for gambling. You could change it in the “actionhandler.class”, by searching for the npc you currently are using.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


Can’t open .class files.

Need a decompiler

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Dialogues
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

[quote=“FuZzIoN, post:1, topic:411579”]Source - Torvapkz V2

http://www.google.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/278837-pi-adding-npc-resets-stats.html

What i’m trying to do - make an npc that resets stats

Problem - When I talk to him he opens up a gambling dialogue.

Reply to me if you need any code I have put[/quote]

Add the dialogues to another npc, because your npc that your using may be used just for gambling. You could change it in the “actionhandler.class”, by searching for the npc you currently are using.
